episodes.title: Coming Round the Mountain | 7
episodes.description: How can the American adoption system change for the better? T. J. sits down with Gretchen Sisson, author of Relinquished: The Politics of Adoption and the Privilege of American Motherhood, for a deep dive on the forces driving adoption and the changes she sees on the horizon. episodes.title: How I Wonder What You Are | 6
episodes.description: As more maternity homes open across the country, Abbi, Zoe, and Toni join a growing chorus of women who are speaking out. And there’s one person in particular who Abbi and Nathan want to hear their story. Dr. Zoe Shaw’s book, “Stronger in the Difficult Places: Heal Your Relationship with Yourself by Untangling Complex Shame” is available here . Follow her podcast, “Stronger in the Difficult Places,” here . Click here to read the full statements from Abbi’s parents, Debbie and Don Blanzy. episodes.title: All the King's Men
episodes.description:
Abbi disobeys her parents, but her son’s open adoption comes with a whole new set of rules she has to follow. The Godparent Home lands on the radar of Child Protective Services, but will the Home face any consequences?

episodes.title: Listen Now: Exposed- Cover-Up at Columbia University
episodes.description:
From the team behind the hit series Dr. Death, Exposed: Cover-Up at Columbia University unfurls the story of Dr. Hadden’s horrific abuse and the ensuing cover-up. It’s a story of power: who has it, how they use it, and what it takes to get it back.

He was a trusted OB-GYN working inside one of the most prestigious universities in the world, an Ivy League school that is home to Nobel Prize winners and medical all-stars. Yet behind closed doors, Dr. Robert Hadden assaulted hundreds — perhaps thousands — of unsuspecting patients. When it looked like no one would be held accountable, the survivors engaged in a decade-long fight for justice.

Binge all episodes of Exposed exclusively and ad-free by joining Wondery+ in the Wondery App, Apple Podcasts or Spotify. Start your free trial by visiting wondery.com/links/exposed/ now.

Liberty Lost will be back with episode 5 next week
